--- title: Implementing nbdev keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A test to show how you can easily create Python libraries from notebook projects! My new functions do wondeful things" ---

Here we've implemented a new function called say_hello

Install¶

pip install implementingnbdev

How to use¶

For now we just have the one function say_hello This prints out a simple statement when passed a name

say_hello("Leanne")

'Hello Leanne!'
tmp_function()

This is working

new_function()

some new func

new_fun(1,2)

3
